channel.title: Banned, and not even read appeal?
channel.description:
I know I will probably never get the account back but I still have like a 0.01% chance of getting it appealed. Why haven't they read the appeals yet, I submitted them on all the day's I received them.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kfI7wbG.png[/img]

item.title: Banned, and not even read appeal?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Customer service is the provision of service to customers before, during and after a purchase. According to Turban et al. (2002),[1] "[b]Customer service is a series of activities designed to enhance the level of customer satisfaction[/b] – that is, the feeling that a product or service has met the customer expectation."

Read full topic
item.source: Banned, and not even read appeal?

item.title: Banned, and not even read appeal?
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:21, topic:525365”][quote author=n10si t link=topic=644109.msg4335917#msg4335917 date=1374367382]
are they really not watching you for rwt? or do you not do that any more?
[/quote]
each account runs on a different IP in the country of my choosing. For example, this post is coming out of Tokyo.[/quote]

Oh, smart. I just figured that they would’ve stopped and said “Hey, wait a minute…”

Read full topic

item.title: Banned, and not even read appeal?
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

casey.:

when a chinaman got control of my account, I emailed them and they responded within an hour/had my account back in three.

are they really not watching you for rwt? or do you not do that any more?

Read full topic
item.source: Banned, and not even read appeal?

item.title: Banned, and not even read appeal?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:15, topic:525365”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=644109.msg4335449#msg4335449 date=1374270101]

terrible customer support
[/quote]yeah its unbelievable how rude they are i broke their rules and they wont even take five minutes of their own sweet time to see how much complete and utter bullshit i could come up with to greater my chances at getting the punishment lifted. god they suck at running a community. like why punish me just cause i broke rules when theirs so many other players that dont break rules and nothing happens to them. you suck jagex; you suck

Why is the child prawnsographer going spastic on my post?
Customer support includes reading appeals, if they fail to do that then I think we can come to the conclusion that they have bad customer support, correct?[/quote]for years they’ve used an automative appeal system, where you could write anything and basically get it appealed. now they don’t use it, and refuse to read appeals for things such as rwt, macroing, bugs/exploits etc. this is because they dont ban unless they’re highly positive they’re correct.

Read full topic
item.source: Banned, and not even read appeal?

item.title: Banned, and not even read appeal?
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:16, topic:525365”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=644109.msg4335812#msg4335812 date=1374351793]

terrible customer support
[/quote]yeah its unbelievable how rude they are i broke their rules and they wont even take five minutes of their own sweet time to see how much complete and utter bullshit i could come up with to greater my chances at getting the punishment lifted. god they suck at running a community. like why punish me just cause i broke rules when theirs so many other players that dont break rules and nothing happens to them. you suck jagex; you suck

Why is the child prawnsographer going spastic on my post?
Customer support includes reading appeals, if they fail to do that then I think we can come to the conclusion that they have bad customer support, correct?

If you permanently banned someone for breaking rules and cheating on your game, would there really be any reason to read the appeal? Honestly, is there?[/quote]
Nope, but it’s unfair to the people who have been muted/banned unfairly which we have been seeing quite allot of since the release of rs07.
Jagex’s bot banning technology doesn’t seem to be able to differentiate between a no-life and a bot very well.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:15, topic:525365”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=644109.msg4335449#msg4335449 date=1374270101]

terrible customer support
[/quote]yeah its unbelievable how rude they are i broke their rules and they wont even take five minutes of their own sweet time to see how much complete and utter bullshit i could come up with to greater my chances at getting the punishment lifted. god they suck at running a community. like why punish me just cause i broke rules when theirs so many other players that dont break rules and nothing happens to them. you suck jagex; you suck

Why is the child prawnsographer going spastic on my post?
Customer support includes reading appeals, if they fail to do that then I think we can come to the conclusion that they have bad customer support, correct?[/quote]
If you permanently banned someone for breaking rules and cheating on your game, would there really be any reason to read the appeal? Honestly, is there?

item.title: Banned, and not even read appeal?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Skyro, post:12, topic:525365”][quote author=Jmood link=topic=644109.msg4335447#msg4335447 date=1374269870]
I still haven’t gotten any reply to my mute for website advertising which didn’t even have any evidence.
[/quote]
Yeah, that’s there new automute system.[/quote]
Really? That makes a lot of sense. I got muted like 3 times in a row once… After each mute ended I got re-muted again for more things within like 3 hours after the unmute lol.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

I myself have several accounts with minor/major mutes, etc that have appeals pending from months back.
As do my friends, terrible customer support but what do you expect from jagex.

item.title: Banned, and not even read appeal?
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

What were you banned for?

Seeing as he has 4 offences on his account, 3 which are inappropriate language, ima assume the first one is either macroing, buying/selling/sharing an account, exploiting a serious bug, or RWT, any other offences wouldn’t have cause a permanent ban yet on your account, and jagex doesn’t review macro offences, I heard they get pushed off to the bottom of the queue of reports that they have to view.

Edit - Didn’t see that he was blocking off another offence actually on the bottom, might’ve been another reason for the ban

Read full topic
